subtitle: Spiritual guidance through tarot, astrology, numerology, and Chinese zodiac
heroSubtitle: Unlock the mysteries of your life through tarot, astrology, and numerology
aboutText: Our platform combines centuries-old divination practices with modern digital convenience. Whether you're seeking guidance through tarot cards, astrology, numerology, or Chinese zodiac wisdom, our tools provide personalized insights to help you navigate life's journey.
tarotDescription: Gain insights into your past, present, and future through the ancient art of tarot
tarotIntro: Focus on a question and select 3 cards to reveal your fortune.
tarotReflection: Take a moment to reflect on how these insights resonate with your current situation.
astrologyDescription: Understand your cosmic blueprint and life's purpose through astrological analysis
horoscopeIntro: Select your zodiac sign to see your horoscope for today.
horoscopeReflection: Consider how this guidance might apply to your day ahead.
numerologyDescription: Discover the hidden meanings behind numbers in your life
numerologyIntro: Discover your Life Path Number and its meaning.
birthDateError: Please enter a valid date of birth
numerologyReflection: How do these numerical insights align with your personal experiences?
chineseZodiacDescription: Explore your personality traits and fortune through the Chinese zodiac system.
chineseZodiacIntro: Discover your zodiac animal and its characteristics.
lunarYearHelp: Note: For those born in Jan or Feb, results may vary due to the Lunar New Year.
birthYearError: Please enter a valid year between 1900 and 2099
chineseZodiacReflection: Embrace the wisdom of your zodiac animal.
shareError: Sharing failed or was cancelled. Your reading has been copied to the clipboard!
shareSuccess: Your reading has been copied to the clipboard!

footer.connectText: Get the latest updates and insights
footer.contactText: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

about.title: About Teller
about.introduction: Welcome to Teller, your digital gateway to ancient wisdom and modern divination. We combine traditional practices with cutting-edge technology to provide accurate and insightful readings.
about.missionText: Our mission is to make divination accessible to everyone, everywhere. We believe in the power of self-discovery and personal growth through ancient wisdom.
about.tarotDescription: Explore the mystical world of tarot with our interactive card readings.
about.astrologyDescription: Discover your cosmic path with personalized horoscope readings.
about.numerologyDescription: Unlock the hidden meanings in your numbers with our numerology calculator.
about.chineseZodiacDescription: Learn about your Chinese zodiac sign and its influence on your life.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.introduction: Explore our collection of innovative web applications and tools designed to enhance your digital experience.
projects.byteslim: A powerful tool for optimizing and compressing your files efficiently.
projects.mvking: Your ultimate destination for music videos and entertainment content.
projects.mdeditor: A modern markdown editor for seamless writing and editing experience.
projects.3we: A community platform connecting people through shared interests.
projects.calculatetoday: Quick and accurate calculations for various everyday needs.
projects.trustavo: Secure and private temporary email service for your online needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.introduction: Find answers to common questions about our services and tools.

general.title: General Questions
general.a1: Teller is a digital divination platform offering various tools for personal insight and guidance.
general.a2: Yes, all our basic services are completely free to use.
general.a3: Our readings are based on traditional divination methods and provide general guidance.

tarot.title: Tarot Reading
tarot.q1: How do I get a tarot reading?
tarot.a1: Simply select the tarot tool and choose three cards for your reading.
tarot.a2: Each card has its own meaning and interpretation, which we explain in detail.
tarot.a3: Yes, you can save and share your readings for future reference.

astrology.title: Astrology
astrology.q1: What information do I need for a horoscope?
astrology.a1: Your birth date, time, and location are needed for accurate readings.
astrology.a2: Our horoscopes are updated daily with fresh insights.
astrology.a3: Yes, we offer compatibility readings between different zodiac signs.

numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.a1: Numerology is the study of numbers and their influence on our lives.
numerology.q2: How is my life path number calculated?
numerology.a2: Your life path number is calculated from your birth date.
numerology.a3: Each number has specific meanings and influences on different aspects of life.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.text: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as your name and email address.

usage.title: Usage Information
usage.text: We collect information about how you use our services and interact with our website.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website.
cookies.essential: Essential cookies for basic website functionality
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand how you use our website
cookies.preferences: Preference cookies to remember your settings

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of your data
rights.restriction: Right to restrict processing of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
